body.name: Fuones Broom and Dustpan Set, Cleaning Supplies Broom and Dustpan Set for Home, 48" Long Stainless Steel Handle Brooms with Upright Dustpan Combo Set for Home Office Kitchen Lobby Floor Cleaning
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Long Handle Broom and Dustpan Set: The broom and dustpan set for the home have a 48" long handle broom, which allows you to sweep comfortably upright without bending over. The broom handle consists of a detachable 22 mm diameter stainless steel pole, ensuring the broom is rust-resistant and structurally strong.

Standing Broom and Dustpan: The broom and dustpan set has a lock design, and you can place the broom and dustpan upright in the gaps of washing machines, refrigerators, cabinets, and other furniture. It is very space-saving, nice, and concealed. Suitable for living room, kitchen, garden, office, etc.

Efficient Cleaning Broom: The widened broom head is made of high-quality and heavy-duty 4-layer bristles and is suitable for cleaning large areas and corners. The broom head can be rotated 180°, making it easier to go deep into the bottom of furniture and corners to capture dust and dirt, saving you precious time.

Self-Cleaning Dustpan: The built-in combs of the dustpan can easily scrape the pet hair and human hair on the broom wire into the dustpan without manual cleaning. The lip of the dustpan fits seamlessly with the ground, sweeping the floor without leaking dust. The ergonomic dustpan handle is more comfortable to use.

High-Quality Cleaning Supplies: Each broom and dustpan set is made with high-quality materials. We also give away a high-quality and practical cleaning brush, you can clean the washbasin, faucet, etc. We absolutely believe that you will not regret your purchase. It will be a good helper for you and your family to clean home hygiene.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose Fuones broom and dustpan set? 1. Long handles allow you to stand upright and sweep comfortably without bending over. 2. The lip of the dustpan fits seamlessly with the ground, sweeping the floor without leaking dust. 3. The dustpan teeth can easily scrape the hair on the broom wire into the dustpan without manual cleaning. 4. 180° rotating broom head, 4-layer high-quality bristles, clean the floor more efficiently. 5. Broom and dustpan set include 1* dustpan, 1* broom and 1*cleaning brush.

Four-layer Bristers The widened broom head is made of high-quality, heavy-duty 4-layer bristles and is suitable for effectively cleaning large areas and corners. 180° Rotating Broom Head You can rotate the broom head 180° according to your needs, making it easier to go deep into the bottom of furniture and corners to capture dust and dirt. Compact Upright Storage The broom and dustpan set can be compactly stored upright in a small corner, saving space and keeping your home tidy and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Lightweight Cleaning Solution
reviews.reviewText: One of the standout features of this set is the long handle broom. With a 48" long handle, it allows me to sweep comfortably without bending over, reducing strain on my back. The stainless steel pole adds durability and rust-resistance to the broom, ensuring it withstands regular use. The 22 mm diameter detachable pole is easy to assemble, making it convenient to set up and use.Efficiency is key when it comes to cleaning, and this set delivers on that front. The widened broom head is equipped with high-quality and heavy-duty 4-layer bristles, making it highly effective in cleaning large areas and corners. The 180° rotation capability of the broom head allows it to reach deep into the bottom of furniture and corners, capturing dust and dirt with ease. This feature saves me valuable time and ensures a thorough cleaning experience.The self-cleaning dustpan is another highlight of this set. It is designed with built-in combs that easily scrape debris from the broom bristles into the dustpan, eliminating the need for manual cleaning. The dustpan's lip fits seamlessly with the ground, preventing dust leakage while sweeping. The ergonomic handle of the dustpan adds to the comfort and ease of use during cleaning sessions.Lastly, I would like to mention the assembly process and the lightweight nature of this set. The broom and dustpan are easy to assemble, requiring no complicated steps or tools. The lightweight construction makes it effortless to maneuver and carry around the house, enabling efficient cleaning without causing strain or fatigue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy to store!
reviews.reviewText: Great product so far! Comes in a few pieces but very easy to put together. You just need to screw the handle in. Seems to be decent quality and is really easy to store since the broom snaps to the dust pan. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for price, broom likes to move a-lot
reviews.reviewText: I like this product and it is a good value for the money. I like that there is a handle on the dustpan to put the broom. The brush of the broom moves for cleaning in hard to reach areas which is nice, BUT it moves easily. I will be sweeping and the head of the brush will turn sideways which can get frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and light weight!
reviews.reviewText: Folds up very easily and tucks away to a small space as needed. I have two cons: one is the fact that the pan does not automatically flip up and two the broom itself is not rigid enough and sometimes does not stay upright when needed. Other than those two miniscule dislikes, it's a great broom/pan combo set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ya la había pedido y llegó roto el recogedor me la reemplazaron x otro nuevo de haber sabido que era tan frágil mejor hubiera pedido un rembolso.No me agrado x que es muy frágil la escoba se puede cambiar de posición lo cual podría ser bueno pero es tan suave el ajuste que barriendo normal se voltea sola y tienes que estar tomandola con la mano para regresarla a su posición original, igual pasa con el recogedor quieres pegarlo más al piso y el agarrador se quiere bajar y si no lo pegas bien al piso la basura no entra al recogedor se pasa x abajo y sigue en el piso asi que no recomiendo este producto para nada no lo regreso x que ya lo use y no se si tenga esa opción de regresarlo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Buffoonery Broom! Not Five but actually a ONE STAR!!!
reviews.reviewText: 🔔🔔🔔 Either gathering 6ft guy in the vid is a 6ft tall Pinocchio or he is partners with this broom company because he telling stories 🔔🔔🔔🚨🚨🚨For $2 you can buy a better broom and dustpan from your local Dollar Store! Continue your search on Amazon or elsewhere!!!🚨🚨🚨I bought this broom because I have two 🐈 🐈‍⬛ & a 🐕 in a 900 Sq Ft two bedroom apartment. The rooms have carpet but the rest is hard floors! Great a cool broom to sweep up cat hair with a cool dustpan to help keep the bristles clean of cat hair. SWEET!!!!NOT SO SWEET!!! The bristles are soooooo fine you can barely sweep anything!!! Took me like five mins just to sweep one corner of cat hair and cat food crumbs😑 better off vacuuming with my Shark Rocket Ultra!This broom is straight buffoonery and definitely NOT worth $25. NOT EVEN WORTH $17 on sale😑😑😑In your hand the broom feels like it’s gonna fall apart.WHATEVER YOU DO!!! If you own this broom…. Do NOT! I repeat DO NOT try and use this broom as a defense mechanism. A raccoon can snatch this light flimsy broom from your hands😩My broom is back in its box ready to be dropped off at Amazon Fresh!!! And I’m back to using my LIBMAN broom that I done had for eight years and it STILL does a better job then this cheaply made brand new broom😑

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Bristle falling out
reviews.reviewText: The dustpan and brush looks good and well made but after using it for awhile the bristles start falling out which is disappointing i have the option to return and get a replacement but due to my limited mobility I am unable to travel to the store to drop off so I am left with no other choice but to bin it when the rest fall out would be good if they did a pickup service.I really like the dustpan and brush I just wish it was better made.
